name: qr-generator-monorepo
description: QR Code Generator with web interface and reusable package
author: Faye

scripts.build: bun run build:web && bun run build:package
scripts.lint: bun run lint --filter=apps/web && bun run lint --filter=@qr-generator/qr-code
scripts.lint:fix: bun run lint:fix --filter=apps/web && bun run lint:fix --filter=@qr-generator/qr-code
scripts.format: bun run format --filter=apps/web && bun run format --filter=@qr-generator/qr-code
